loans.name: Najah

texts.en:
Najah has been doing a small retail business selling clothes and blankets to friends, relatives and neighbors. Now that her circle has gotten bigger to include friends of friends, the demand for new items has increased. Najah wants to start selling home products too, since most of her customers are housewives. For this, she has applied for a loan.

Najah is a 39-year-old married woman. She is the mother of two boys and a girl.

loans.use: to add selling home products

loans.name: Narelie

texts.en:
To make a living, Narelie patiently runs her home-based store. She has been engaged in this kind of business since December 2011. Narelie is a young entrepreneur and a married woman who has two children.

Narelie said that running her business is quite difficult because of some factors that could really affect it such as credit. So, she is doing her best in order to make her store grow. She is really thankful because her business runs smoothly. But still, her capital is not sufficient due to her expenses for her children, including milk, diapers, and their daily needs. For this reason, Narelie is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 15,000 to buy more merchandise for her store. She hopes to obtain the requested loan in order to increase her profits and save some for her children's education and to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Estefani

texts.es: Estefani de 22 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su mamá Rosa y su hermano Andrés al que apoya en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Saño. Su padre murió hace 4 años, desde entonces tuvo que afrontar las responsabilidades de la familia. “Aprendí a ser independiente”, comenta. Pues comenzó a estudiar diseño gráfico en un instituto reconocido de la zona, donde además logró apasionarse de la fotografía, llevando cursos de especialización en la capital con reconocidas figuras del medio local. De eso hace ya 2 años, donde viene trabajando como fotógrafa independiente, haciendo fotografías publicitarias para empresas nacionales, gana muy bien pero como recién comenzó en este negocio. Todavía no tiene un estudio fotográfico especializado, su mayor deseo es contar con uno propio, para ello ya dio el primer paso acondicionando el espacio para el estudio y el segundo en la compra de luces especializadas. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde se siente contenta de recibir el apoyo económico para progresar en su negocio. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues su asociación lo conforman personas responsables y solidarias. Estefani de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de luces que cuesta un promedio de 500 dólares, con lo que quiere implementar su estudio fotográfico.
texts.en:
Estefani, age 22, is a hard-working woman.  She lives with her mother, Rosa, and her brother, Andrés, whom she supports.  They live in their own house in San Pedro de Saño.

Her father died four years ago, and ever since then she has had to face the family responsibilities.  “I learned to be independent,” she says.  She started to study graphic design in a well-known institute in the area.  That is where she also managed to become passionate about photography.  She took specialization classes in the capital with people who are well-known locally in the field. 

From there it has been two years since she has been working as an independent photographer.  She takes publicity photographs for national companies.  She earns very well for having recently started in this business.  She still does not have a specialized photography studio.  Her biggest wish is to have one of her own.  She has already taken the first step by fixing up the space for the studio.  The second step is to buy the specialized lights.

This is her first loan with MFP, where she is happy to receive financial support in order to progress in her business.  She pledges to make her payments punctually.  Her communal bank is comprised of responsible and supportive people.  Upon receiving your support Estefani will use the loan to buy lights, which cost an average of $500.  She wants to use the light to set up her photography studio.

loans.use: to buy lights for her photography studio.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to her business to make space to put in a freezer to sell ice cream.

loans.name: Jamala

texts.en:
Jamala, 53 years old, is widowed. She has seven sons and daughters living with her. Three of them have their own jobs so they participate financially in the family expenses to help their mother.

Jamala has a small business working at home making crafts like baskets and trays from straw. She wants to start making vases in different shapes also from straw to have different items to sell. So she applied for this loan in order to buy more tools and materials needed to do so.

loans.use: to buy more tools and straw

loans.name: Ahlam

texts.en:
Ahlam is a conservative person so for that reason she asked her husband Hamzah to take her place in the photo.

Ahlam, 20 years old, is a married lady. Her husband has recently retired from the military and opened a small grocery shop. They have two children. Hamzah is working now on filling the store with more food products, but Ahlam wants to design a sign for the store so she has applied for this loan to do so and to buy more food products for the store.

loans.use: to buy more food products and design a sign for the store

loans.name: Ly

texts.en:
Ly and his wife Srey are farmers. They grow cauliflower, corn, and cucumbers on their farmland in the village where they live. They have been married since 1981, and have nine children; six of their children are married, one assists his parents in farming business, and two are in school.

Ly wants to continue his farming business because it is a main source of income. Therefore, he decided to apply for a loan in the amount of $600 to purchase fertilizer and pesticide to maintain his vegetable farm.

In this photo, Ly is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and pesticide to maintain his vegetable farm.

loans.name: Samorn's Group

texts.en:
Samorn, 53, lives with her husband in a rural village in the Prey Chhor District of Cambodia. She has only one child who is now independent. 

To make a living, she and her husband grow rice on one and a half hectares of farmland and also plant vegetables such as water convolvulus, cabbage, and beans, etc. They have been in this business for 30 years and Samorn can earn about US $6 per day. This is Samorn's first loan from VisionFund. She leads a group of other two members who are also receiving their first loans and they are requesting KHR 400,000 each. As the group leader, Samorn will use her portion of the loan to buy gasoline for a water pump and to drill a well to irrigate her farmland and vegetable garden. She hopes that she can grow her crops healthily and earn more income than before.

loans.use: To buy gasoline for a water pump and to drill a well to irrigate her farmland and vegetable garden.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Chantha

texts.en:
Chantha (in the photo) is now a cleaner for a factory. In the past, she sold desserts. Her husband, Sras, is a motor taxi driver and he also grows rice when rice farming season comes. 

In 2009, Chantha applied for a Kiva loan to purchase a motorbike for commuting. The motorbike now is broken and uses more gasoline, so she decided to apply for a loan of $600 to replace it with a new motorbike. 

Chantha and her husband live in a Phnom Penh suburb. They have been married since 1993 and have four children. Unfortunately, one of her children passed away. Another one is a garment worker and the others are married and live separately.

loans.use: to buy a new motorbike.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es:
Ana es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida que han hecho que sus fuerzas se debiliten y le sea muy dificultoso salir adelante, sin embargo, siempre ha podido sacar fuerzas y continuar progresando para poder ofrecerle a sus hijos una calidad de vida digna. Ana es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 4 hijos, quienes son su motivación para esforzarse diariamente en la búsqueda de ingresos para su hogar. Ana ha trabajado gran parte de su vida la actividad de la confección, y la mayor parte del tiempo lo ha hecho como empleada temporal en algunos talleres de confección, sin embargo, la escasez de trabajo ha sido tal, que a menudo sus ingresos son tan reducidos que por la falta de recursos para ofrecerles una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos, su hijo menor ha sido llevado a vivir en una casa del gobierno, donde le pueden garantizar una mejor calidad de vida. Ana se ha decidido por montar su propio taller de confección, sin embargo, la máquina con la que cuenta se encuentra muy deteriorada, y esto hace que su trabajo sea muy complicado. Es por esto que Ana busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina de confección industrial con la que pueda realizar su trabajo con mayor calidad.

Ana espera que con su propio taller tenga la capacidad de generar ingresos con los cuales pueda llevar a vivir a su hijo con ella, además, sueña con que sus hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas que les permita cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Ana is a person who has had to go through a lot of adversities in her life that have weakened her strength and made it very difficult for her to get ahead.  However, she has always been able to gather her strength and continue making progress to be able to give her children a decent quality of life.

Ana is a single mother and head of the family of four children who are her motivation to make the effort daily in the search for income for her household.  Ana has worked in sewing a big part of her life, and most of the time she has done it as a seasonal employee in several sewing workshops.  Nevertheless, the scarcity of work has been such that often her income is so reduced that, for lack of resources to give her children a good quality of life, her youngest son has been taken to live in a government home where they can give him a better quality of life.

Ana has decided to set up her own sewing workshop.  However, the machine she has is run down, and this makes her work very complicated.  This is why Ana is looking for a loan that will give her the opportunity to buy an industrial sewing machine with which she can do a better quality of work.

Ana hopes that with her own workshop she will have the capacity to generate income to be able to bring her son to live with her.  In addition, she dreams that her children will be able to have a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities that will allow them to realize their dreams.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine to do higher-quality work.

loans.name: At

texts.en:
At, age 42, is a farmer. Her husband, Yoeurn, age 45, is a house constructor. They have been married since 1991, and they have two sons and two daughters; one of their children assists his father in the construction business, another one stays at home, and the others attend school.  The family lives on an island in the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

At is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,500 to purchase additional construction materials for her husband’s construction business.  

In this photo, At is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: To purchase additional construction materials for her husband’s construction business.

loans.name: Noeun

texts.en:
Noeun (pictured above) is 49 years old and her husband, Sophal, is 48 years old. They live in a village about 20 kilometers away from Phnom Penh City. They have three children - one son and two daughters. Two of the children are garment workers and another one attends school. 
  
Noeun is a farmer and raises cows at home, while her husband is a construction worker. She is asking for a loan of $1,500 to buy a motorbike to get to work because she commutes to work by taxi, on which she spends lots of money.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to get to work.

loans.name: Pisey

texts.en:
Pisey (in the photo) is 30 years old and her husband, Peseth, is 32 years old. They have been married since 2008, and they live on an island in the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Pisey and her husband sell furniture. She is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,000 to renovate the house where she lives.

loans.use: To renovate the house where she lives.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a coverstitch sewing machine, which will complete her shop and allow her to offer her clients all types of completed garments.

loans.name: Arcadio De Jesus

texts.es:
Arcadio es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador, y esta cualidad le ha permitido salir adelante con su familia. Arcadio se encuentra casado y tiene 3 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una educación de calidad. Desde muy temprana edad conoció por medio de su padre la actividad de la crianza de animales, pues su padre siempre tuvo animales y con esto generaba los ingresos para su hogar. Gracias al gran conocimiento y experiencia que tiene Arcadio en la crianza de animales, muchas personas lo buscan para que los asesore en esta actividad; esto le ha traído un gran reconocimiento en su sector y gracias a esto muy buenas ventas. Arcadio se dedica a la crianza de cerdos principalmente, y con esta actividad genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Con el ánimo de sacar su negocio adelante, Arcadio busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de cuido de engorde para sus cerdos.

Arcadio espera poder obtener el cuido sin que sus ingresos mensuales se vean afectados, pues actualmente presenta muy poca liquidez debido a que está construyendo su casa propia, esto gracias a que también conoce la actividad de la construcción. Arcadio sueña con tener un buen negocio, con terminar de construir su propia casa y con ofrecerles a su esposa y sus 3 hijos una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Arcadio has always been known as a hard worker and this quality has helped him push his family ahead.  Arcadio is married and has 3 children to whom he has always wanted to give the best quality education.  From the time he was very young his father taught him how to raise animals.  His father always had livestock and this is how he supported his family.   Thanks to the learning and experience that Arcadio has with animal husbandry, many people seek him out to help with this business which has brought him renown in his field and thanks to his reputation, very good sales.  Arcadio principally raises pigs and this business has given him the necessary income to support his family.  With the enthusiasm of increasing his business, 
Arcadio is requesting a loan to give him the possibility of buying animal feed to fatten his pigs.

Arcadio hopes to get the feed without affecting his monthly income.  Currently he has very little liquid cash because he is building his own house.  This is thanks to the fact that he also knows the construction trade.  He dreams of having a good business, finishing his house, and giving his wife and their 3 children a good quality of life and better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy animal feed to fatten his pigs

loans.name: Shahnaz's Group

texts.en:
Shahnaz is 40 years old, married, and has one daughter who is 7 years old and reads at the 3rd standard level. Shahnaz herself is a very kind-hearted lady. She spends her time at home and takes care of her family. 
 
Shahnaz's husband runs a grocery store and generates income for the family. The grocery business is a very profitable business, but is very challenging, too. It is challenging in the sense that there are many other grocery stores in competition, which is reflected in their earnings. To beat the competition, the availability of grocery stock is of the highest importance in order to meet the needs of customers and turn them into regular customers.

That is why Shahnaz has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan, he will purchase a larger stock of groceries for his store in order to fulfill his clients' orders and achieve better results.

Shahnaz is very confident that her husband's good business skills will enable him to make good use of this loan.

loans.use: To buy groceries for her husband's grocery store business.

loans.name: Khun

texts.en:
Khun (in the photo) is 37 years old and her husband, Sam Oeurn, is 43 years old.  They live in a village about twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1990, and have five children, two sons and three daughters. One of their children is a garment worker, two attend school, and the other two are still young. 

Khun and her husband produce jars for sale. She is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,500 to purchase a motorbike and trailer to transport their jars for sale in her village and nearby villages.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike and trailer to carry jars.

loans.name: Vanroeun

texts.en:
Vanroeun (pictured here) sells gasoline at home. Her husband, Channa, is a driver who drives for a company. They have been married since 2001 and have two young sons. They live in a village approximately 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Vanroeun is asking for her second loan of $1,200 to buy a motorbike for her husband because the old one breaks down, and he often spends lots of money to make the repairs.

loans.use: to buy a new motorbike for her husband

loans.name: Sophat

texts.en: Sophat (in the photo) is a retired soldier. He is now a fisherman and grows rice, while his wife sells groceries and Chinese noodles. They live in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City, and they have five sons who are in school. Sophat is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,500 to purchase a motorcycle for commuting.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Samoeurn

texts.en:
Samoeurn (in the photo) is a taxi driver.  He drives garment factory workers from his village to the factory and back. His wife, Sitha, sells vegetables in the Phnom Penh market. They live in a small village outside of Phnom Penh and they have three children: one son and two daughters. 

Samoeurn has asked for a Kiva loan in the past. He is now asking for his second loan in the amount of $600 to build a fence around his house.

loans.use: To build a fence around his house.

loans.name: Phalla

texts.en: Phalla (in the photo) sells duck eggs, while her husband is a tuk-tuk taxi driver. They live in a village about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh, and they have two children who are in school. Phalla is asking for a loan of $1,500 to purchase a new tuk-tuk for her husband because the current one is old and breaks.

loans.use: to buy a new tuk-tuk for her husband

loans.name: Met

texts.en:
Met (in the photo), age 46, is a motor taxi driver. His wife, Yorn, age 35, is a garment worker. They have been married since 1990 and have one son and two daughters. One is married and lives outside the family home and the other two are garment workers. 

Met is asking for a loan in the amount of $500 in order to repair the house where he lives because the house is old and broken in some parts.

loans.use: To repair the house where he lives.

loans.name: Sreyneang

texts.en:
Sreyneang is a widow and a mother with two daughters who are in school. The family lives on an island in the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh. Sreyneang (in the photo) sells Khmer noodle in her village. Khmer noodle or Num Banh Chok is considered the national dish of Cambodia and can be served with a green curry soup and banana flowers, bean sprouts, water lily stalks and cucumber.

Sreyneang sells Num Banh Chok in the morning till almost mid-day. In the afternoon, she sells vegetables. She buys vegetables from fellow farmers in her village and carries them by bicycle to resell in front of the garment factory. She is also a scarf weaver.   

Sreyneang wants to replace her bicycle with a motorbike, which will make it easy for her to transport vegetables. Hence, she decided to apply for a loan of $700 to purchase a motorbike.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to carry vegetables.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.es:
Rosita, de 37 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, es madre de sus 03 apreciados hijos a quienes les brinda mucha dedicación. Rosita, se dedica a la compra y venta de frutos cosechados de cacao y café; ella normalmente llega a adquirir de los agricultores  de su localidad. Ella les compra  a un precio que hace ganar a los agricultores y es una ventaja de que ya no puedan ir hasta los centros de acopio muy lejanos porque Rosita es quien las lleva y a ella le pagan muy bien por ese trabajo; lleva 05 años realizando esta labor y le es muy sencillo hacer trabajo ya que es el único sustento para ofrecer a sus hijos. Con el tiempo desea en tener su propio centro de acopio para sus compañeros agricultores. Ahora lo que mas prioriza es seguir comprando mas sacos de cosechas y así tener una buena ganancia y de esa manera ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida para sus hijos. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete a ser muy puntual con sus cuotas de pago.
Con el préstamo solicitado comprará sacos de cosechas con granos de cacao y café; de esa manera llevarlas a los centros de acopio.
texts.en:
Rosita is 37, and is a hard-working woman. She is the mother of three beloved children to whom she is very devoted. Rosita buys and sells harvested  cacao and coffee. Normally she manages to buy these from local farmers. 

She buys them at a price that enables the farmers to make money, and it is an advantage that they don't have to go to the very distant collection centers, because Rosita is the one who takes them, and they pay her very well for that work. She has been working at this for five years, and her need to work is very straightforward; it is the only support she can offer her children.

In time she wishes to have her own collection center for the farmer who are her partners. Her highest priority now is to continue buying more sacks of harvested beans, and this way earn a good return, and provide a better quality of life for her children.

This will be her first loan with MFP, so she is hoping for a small loan so that she can fulfill her objectives. Moreover, she promises to be very punctual in making her installment payments. With the loan applied for, she will buy sacks of coffee and cacao beans, and that way take them to the collection centers.

loans.use: To buy sacks of coffee and cacao beans.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a mother who loves to cook. She sell meals and snacks in front of the school campus. This is her way of helping her husband to generate income. She is now 49 years old and has only one child. With the help of her husband, they are able to satisfy their necessities and support the education of their child. 

Despite the hardship of living, Teresita aims to improve the business so that she can increase her income. Due to insufficient capital, she wants to ask for an additional 20,000 PHP to buy pork, fish, vegetables and ingredients needed to cook and sell in her food stall. She believes that the loan will be a great help to her in improving her business. She hopes that someday her business will grow and become a viable source of income.

loans.use: to buy pork, fish, vegetables and ingredients needed to cook and sell in the food stall.

loans.name: Saveun

texts.en:
Saveun, age 41, is a widow. She has one son who is a construction worker and two daughters - one married and living in a separate home and the other is a garment worker. She lives in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Saveun is a farmer. She is applying for a loan in the amount of $1,200 to purchase a motorbike for her son to get work.  
Saveun is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike for her son to get work.

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es:
Clotilde, de 33 años, es una mujer soltera y vive en su propia casa,  quien desea tener una buena estadía.
Ella es una mujer de provecho, dedicada a su trabajo y pendiente de su siembra de café y cacao; ya que depende de ella para la obtención de buenos frutos. Lo que mas le gusta de trabajo es poder realizar junto a sus vecinos de manera que llegan a avanzar rápido  y  quienes le dan iniciativa para seguir adelante con la finalidad de seguir obteniendo  plantas de café y cacao; de manera  que es el sustento para seguir mejorando su estadía, a la vez considera difícil sobre las breñas que llegan crecen en medio de las plantas de sus sembradíos. Hasta ahora cuenta con el apoyo de los financistas de MFP ya que ellos apoyan la manera como trabaja Clotilde, en su campo de cultivo. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP; y será muy responsable como siempre, además está conforme con el trabajo de su banco comunal porque son personas responsables. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará abono para cuidar sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Clotilde, 33 years old, is a single woman who lives in her own house, who would like to have a good standard of living. She is a hardworking woman, dedicated to her work and always tending to her coffee and cocoa crops, given that she depends on them to obtain good fruit. What she loves most about her job is the ability to produce alongside her neighbors in a way that they advance rapidly, who give each other incentive to keep working with the aim to continue obtaining coffee and cocoa plants. This is the way she will continue improving her standard of living, but at the same time it is difficult to overcome the bushes that grow in the middle of her crops. 

Until now she has had the support of the financiers of Prisma, as they support the way that Clotilde works in her field. This will be her 5th loan with Prisma. She will be very responsible as always, and she is happy with her communal bank because they are responsible people. With the 1,000 Soles, she will buy fertilizer to care for her plantations.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Albeiro De Jesus

texts.es:
Albeiro a pesar de todas las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida, ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando junto con su familia. Desde muy temprana edad aprendió las labores del campo, pues sus padres siempre se dedicaron a esta actividad y rápidamente se la enseñaron a Albeiro. Cuando su padre murió, heredó el terreno donde actualmente cultiva gran variedad de frutas, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Albeiro se encuentra casado y es padre de 3 hijos, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena educación. En su negocio cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes, quienes le garantizan un muy buen nivel de ventas, sin embargo, Albeiro presenta la dificultad de que sus productos los debe entregar a sus clientes en un sitio muy lejano de donde cultiva los productos, por lo que los debe cargar en hombros durante mucho tiempo; debido a esto, Albeiro ya ha estado presentando problemas de salud. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Albeiro busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de un caballo para transportar sus productos y no tenerlos que cargar en su hombro hasta el sitio donde los entrega a sus clientes.

Albeiro espera que de esta manera pueda transportar de mejor manera sus productos, y así pueda conservar su salud. Además, como demorará menos tiempo en llevar sus productos hasta el sitio de entrega, podrá entregar mayor cantidad de pedidos, pues actualmente debe negarse a entregar pedidos a sus clientes porque no le alcanza su tiempo para hacer todos los recorridos. Albeirot sueña con poder tener un gran negocio y que este le permita sacar a su familia adelante, además, sueña con que sus hijos puedan acceder a una educación de calidad y puedan en un futuro ser unos profesionales.
texts.en:
Albeiro, in spite of all the adversities that life has presented him, has had the fortitude to advance and continue making progress, together with his family. From a very young age, he learned the work of the fields, since his parents always worked at this activity and they rapidly taught it to Albeiro. When his father died, he inherited the land where he now raises a great variety of fruits, and thanks to this he generates the income necessary to sustain his household. Albeiro is married and is the father of three children, to whom he has always wanted to offer a good education. In his business, he has a large number of customers, who guarantee him a very good level of sales. Nevertheless, Albeiro has the difficulty that he needs to deliver his products to his customers at a location that is very far from where he grows his products, and for this reason he has to carry them on his shoulders for a long time. Because of this, Albeiro has already experienced some health problems. With the spirit to improve this situation, Albeiro is seeking a loan, which will offer him the possibility of being able to purchase a horse to transport his products so that he won't have to carry them on his shoulders to the place where he delivers them to his customers.

Albeiro hopes that in this way he can transport his products in a better way, and thus he can preserve his health. In addition, as it will take less time to take his products to the delivery site, he will be able to fill a larger quantity of orders, since now he has to turn down some orders from his customers because he doesn't have enough time to make all the trips. Albeiro dreams of being able to have a large business and that this will allow him to move his family forward. Furthermore, he dreams that his children can have access to a quality education and in the future can have careers.

loans.use: to buy a horse to transport his products so that he doesn't have to carry them on his shoulders to the place where he delivers them to his customers

loans.name: Carlos Humberto

texts.es:
Carlos se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a la venta de legumbres. Hace más de 35 años tenía un local donde vendía legumbres y decidió venderlo por circunstancias ajenas a su voluntad. Luego de haber superado esta dificultad, retomó su negocio y actualmente comercializa las legumbres a restaurantes, colegios donde ofrecen el servicio de alimentación, y otras entidades que brindan comida para las personas desplazadas. Carlos ha podido captar muy buena clientela gracias a la buena atención que ofrece a sus clientes, y gracias a esto su familia puede gozar de muy buena calidad de vida. Carlos se encuentra casado y tiene 3 hijos que siempre han sido su motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio para sacarlos adelante. Con el ánimo de surtir su negocio, Carlos busca un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de legumbres para surtir su negocio y ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad de productos. 
Carlos espera que de esta manera su negocio le siga ofreciendo los ingresos que requiere para el sostenimiento de su familia, además, de poderles mejorar la calidad de vida a su esposa y sus 3 hijos. Carlos sueña con tener un gran negocio, donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y desde el cual su familia pueda tener mayores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Carlos has dedicated a large part of his life to the sale of vegetables. Over 35 years ago he had a shop where he would sell vegetables, and he decided to sell it for circumstances beyond his control. After overcoming this difficulty, he restarted his business and currently sells vegetables to restaurants, schools that offer food services, and other entities that provide food for displaced people. Carlos has been able to attract very good clientele thanks to the good attention that he offers his clients, and thanks to this his family has been able to enjoy a very good quality of life. 

Carlos is married and has 3 children that have always been his motivation to work hard at his business to get them ahead. With the aim to invest in his business, Carlos is looking for a loan that will allow him to complete the purchase of vegetables to stock his business and offer his clients a greater variety of products. 

Carlos hopes that in this way his business will continue providing the income that he needs to support his family, and additionally to be able to improve the quality of life of his wife and 3 children. Carlos dreams of having a great business, where he can generate employment for the most needy people, and from which his family can have better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to stock his business and offer his clients a greater variety of products.

loans.name: German Andres

texts.es:
German es un joven emprendedor que a pesar de su corta edad ya es dueño de su propio negocio y tiene la oportunidad de contribuir económicamente en su hogar para mejorar la calidad de vida de sus padres. German siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y esto se ve reflejado en que su negocio es caracterizado por el buen servicio que ofrece. German tiene un negocio donde alquila películas, vende videojuegos y ofrece el servicio de reparación de videojuegos a sus clientes. La actividad la aprendió de un amigo que la sabía hacer e invitó a Germán para que la aprendiera a su lado, así fue como posteriormente tomó la decisión de montar su propio negocio y tener una fuente de ingresos para contribuir en su hogar. El negocio lo atiende en las horas de la tarde, pues en las mañanas estudia ingeniería química la cual puede pagar gracias a los ingresos que le da su negocio. Con el ánimo de ofrecer cada día un mejor servicio, German busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de videojuegos, películas, y repuestos para el servicio de reparación de videojuegos en su negocio.

German espera que su negocio siga saliendo adelante y siga creciendo como lo ha venido haciendo. Espera que con mayores ingresos sus padres puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y pueda seguir pagando sus estudios universitarios. German sueña con tener un gran negocio con varios puntos de atención, y donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Germán is an enterprising youth despite his young age, and he is the owner of his own business.  He has the opportunity to contribute economically to his home and to improve his parents' quality of life.  Germán has always been characterized by being very hard-working, and this is reflected in the fact that his business is characterized by the good service that he offers.  He learned this work from a friend who invited Germán to learn at his side.  Later, he decided to start his own business and have a source of income to contribute to his home.  He attends to his business in the afternoons.  In the mornings, he studies chemical engineering, which he can pay for thanks to the income from his business.  With the inspiration of offering better service every day, Germán is looking for a loan that will offer him the opportunity to purchase videogames, movies, and parts to repair videogames at his business.

Germán hopes that his business will keep progressing and growing like it has been doing.  He hopes that with more income, his parents will be able to enjoy a better quality of life and that he can keep paying for college.  Germán dreams about having a large business with several focuses where he can generate jobs for the people that need them most.

loans.use: to buy videogames, movies, and parts for repairing videogames at his business.

loans.name: Clara Yolima

texts.es:
Clara es una persona que se caracteriza por sus ganas de sacar a su familia adelante, por lo que se esfuerza diariamente en su trabajo para poder ofrecerles una buena calidad de vida. Clara es educadora de una escuela rural que se ubica a media hora de su municipio, y con este empleo genera ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. En su hogar tiene a 5 personas a cargo, entre los que se encuentra su esposo que en la actualidad se encuentra desempleado por las pocas oportunidades laborales que encuentra. Debido a que su salario no le alcanza para cubrir todos los gastos de su hogar, Clara, motivada porque una de sus hijas que es menor de edad sabe arreglar y decorar uñas, decidió montar su propio salón de belleza, y así generar mayores ingresos con los cuales pueda sostener todos los gastos de su hogar. Clara trabaja en las mañanas como educadora, y en las tardes espera trabajar en su salón de belleza. Con el ánimo de terminar de montar su negocio, Clara busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de sillas, una mesa, un lava-cabezas, entre otras herramientas más que requiere para terminar de montar su negocio.

Clara espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, y con esto poderles mejorar la calidad de vida a las personas de su hogar. Clara sueña con tener un gran negocio el cual le permita generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y con el cual ya no tenga que sufrir su familia por los pocos recursos económicos con los que cuenta.
texts.en:
Clara is a person that is characterized by her desire to get her family ahead, for which she fights daily in her job in order to offer them a good quality of life. Clara is an educator in a rural school located half an hour away from her town, and with this employment she generates the necessary income to sustain her home. In her home she is in charge of 5 people, including her husband who currently finds himself unemployed as a result of the few job opportunities that he finds. Given that her salary is not enough to cover all of the home expenses, Clara, motivated because one of her young daughters knows how to fix and decorate nails, decided to build her own beauty salon and in this way generate greater income with which she can sustain all of her home expenses. Clara works in the mornings as a teacher, and in the afternoons works in her beauty salon. With the aim to finish building her business, Clara is looking for a loan that will offer her the opportunity to be able to buy chairs, a table, a wash unit and other additional tools that she needs to finish building her business.

Clara hopes that in this way she will be able to considerably increase her income, and that with this she will be able to improve the quality of life of the people living in her home. Clara dreams of having a great business that will generate employment for the most needy people and with which her family will no longer have to suffer because of the few economic resources that they have.

loans.use: to buy chairs, a table, a wash unit and other tools that she needs to finish     building her business.

loans.name: Doris Mabel

texts.es:
Doris se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a la actividad de la confección, actividad con la cual ha podido contribuir económicamente al sostenimiento de su hogar. Doris aprendió trabajando en una empresa de confecciones donde luego de un largo tiempo decidió independizarse por propuesta de su esposo para realizar la actividad como independiente desde su casa. Desde allí, Doris empezó a trabajar desde su casa y aumentó sus ingresos considerablemente. Gracias a esto, Doris puede estar al pendiente de su negocio como el de su casa, y esto ha llevado a que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que su taller lo montó con muy bajos recursos, Doris busca que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de insumos para la confección como hilos, telas, botones, entre otros y a realizar el mantenimiento de una de sus máquinas.

Gracias a esto Doris podrá seguir ofreciendo un servicio de buena calidad a sus clientes y con esto podrá aportar mayores ingresos para su hogar. Además, Doris sueña con que su taller le brinde a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Doris has dedicated a great part of her life to dressmaking, an activity through which she has been able to contribute economically to sustaining her household. Doris learned this trade working in a dressmaking enterprise where after lengthy employment, she decided to become independent, as suggested by her husband, and began  working independently from her home. From this point on, Doris was able to combine dressmaking with her house work and increased her income considerably. This resulted in her family having a better quality of life. 

Since her shop began with very limited resources, Doris is seeking a loan that will allow her to buy dressmaking supplies such as thread, cloth, and buttons, among other things, and to perform maintenance on one of her sewing machines. 

Thanks to the loan, Doris will be able to continue offering services of high quality to her customers, and will earn a larger income for her household. In addition, Doris' dream is that her shop will offer her family a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities.

loans.use: buy supplies for dressmaking, such as thread, cloth, and buttons, among others, and to repair one of her sewing machines.

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Gloria tiene un negocio donde ofrece productos de peluquería y tratamientos para el cabello y la piel, pues tiene conocimientos de la actividad de la peluquería y por esto decidió montar un negocio con estos productos. Gloria se encuentra casada y tiene 1 hijo de 21 años a quien le ha estado brindando la oportunidad de acceder a su educación universitaria, por lo que trabaja fuertemente para pagar los gastos de sus estudios. Gloria, desde su negocio, aporta económicamente en su hogar, lo que le ha permitido a su familia tener una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece, su negocio ha tenido muy buen reconocimiento y esto le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas. Con el ánimo de surtir su negocio, Gloria busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de peluquería y tratamientos para el cabello y así aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes. 

Gloria espera que de esta manera sus ingresos mensuales aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá atender más necesidades de sus clientes que se traducirá en mayores ventas. Además, Gloria espera que con su negocio tenga la oportunidad de seguir brindándole la educación universitaria a su hijo para que se convierta en un profesional y pueda conseguir un empleo bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Gloria has a business selling hair-dressing products and hair and skin treatments.  She has knowledge of hair-dressing, and for this reason decided to set up a a business with these products.  Gloria is married and has a 21-year-old son for whom she has provided the opportunity of a university education.  She works extremely hard to pay the cost of his studies.

With her business, Gloria is able to contribute financially to her household, which has allowed her family to have a better quality of life and more opportunities to progress.  Thanks to the good service that she provides, her business has become well recognized, and this has brought her very good sales.

With the goal of stocking up her business, Gloria is looking for a loan that will provide her with the opportunity to purchase hair-dressing products and hair treatments, and in this way expand the variety of products that she offers for sale to her customers.  Gloria hopes that in this way her monthly income will increase considerably, as she will be able to meet more of her customers' needs, which will translate into higher sales.  In addition, Gloria hopes that her business will be able to continue providing a university education for her son, so that he can become a professional, and be able to get a well-paid job.

loans.use: to purchase hair-dressing products and hair treatments, and in this way increase the variety of products that she offers for sale for her customers.

loans.name: Gustavo Adolfo

texts.es:
Gustavo se ha dedicado desde muy temprana edad a la actividad del transporte de materiales, pues su familia se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante varias generaciones. Gracias a esto, Gustavo tiene un gran reconocimiento en el municipio y eso le permite tener muy buenas ventas. Gustavo se esfuerza en su trabajo diariamente con el ánimo de sacar a su esposa y su hijo de 6 años adelante, además de que su esposa se encuentra en el octavo mes de embarazo. Con el trabajo que tiene Gustavo genera los ingresos necesarios para su hogar y con esto le brinda a su familia una buena calidad de vida. Transportando las mercancías en un coche arrastrado por un caballo, se le ha presentado el problema de la enfermedad de su caballo, es por esto que busca que un préstamo que le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de un caballo y realizar mantenimiento a su coche. 
Gustavo espera que de esta manera sus ingresos mensuales no se vean afectados por la compra de un nuevo caballo, y así poder seguir generando los ingresos que requiere el sostenimiento de su hogar. Gustavo tiene el sueño de poder generar buenos ingresos para su familia y conseguir en un futuro su propia casa y sacar a sus hijos adelante.
texts.en:
From a very early age, Gustavo has transported materials.  His family has made a living this way for several generations.  Thanks to this, Gustavo has a great knowledge in the city, and this lets him make good sales.  Gustavo works hard every day with the motivation of taking good care of his wife and 6-year-old son.  His wife is also 8 months pregnant.  With Gustavo's job, he generates the necessary income for his home, and he offers his family a good quality of life.  He transports merchandise in a horse-drawn cart, but he faces the problem of his horse being sick.  This is why he is looking for a loan that will offer him the opportunity to buy a horse and maintain his cart.

Gustavo hopes that in this way, his monthly income won't be affected by buying a new horse, and he will be able to keep generating the income that he needs to support his home.  Gustavo's dream is to be able to keep making income for his family, to have his own home in the future, and to take good care of his children.

loans.use: to buy a horse and to maintain his cart.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new oven and matierals that his bakery needs.

loans.name: Berta Amparo

texts.es:
Berta es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Berta se encuentra casada y es madre de 11 hijos, a quienes ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo. Con el ánimo de generar ingresos extras, debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar, montó un negocio de fabricación de arepas con el cual genera ingresos para contribuir junto con su esposo a los ingresos para su hogar. De esta manera, Berta ha podido contribuir considerablemente para que su familia goce de una mejor calidad de vida y de mejores oportunidades económicas. El negocio de Berta ha tenido muy buena acogida entre sus clientes y ha podido tener muy buenos niveles de ventas gracias a esto, por lo que Berta cada vez ha ido incrementando la producción de su negocio para atender los pedidos que le hacen. Con el ánimo de realizar algunas mejoras a su negocio, Berta busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a realizar mejoras locativas en su fogón y comprar una máquina de moler.
Berta espera que de esta manera la capacidad de producción de su negocio aumente y de esta manera pueda satisfacer todos los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes, además, espera que con mayores ingresos su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Berta is a very hardworking person who always wants to give her family a better quality of life.  Berta is married and the mother of 11 children, whom she has gotten ahead with great effort.  With the intention of generating extra income, because her husband's income was not sufficient to maintain the household, she set up a business making "arepas" [cornmeal rolls] with which she generates income to contribute with her husband to the household income.  In this way Berta has been able to contribute considerably so her family enjoys a better quality of life and better economic opportunities.

Berta's business has had a very good reception among her customers and she has had very good levels of sales thanks to this.  Berta has increased her business production more all the time to be able to attend to the orders made of her.

With the intention of making some improvements to her business, Berta looks for a loan to give her the opportunity to make improvements to her stove and to buy a machine for grinding.

Berta hopes that in this way the production capacity of her business increases and she can satisfy all the requests her customers have made of her.  In addition, she hopes that with greater income her family can enjoy a better quality of life and better opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to make improvements on her stove and to buy a machine for grinding.

loans.name: Daneira Del Socorro

texts.es:
Daneira se dedica a la venta de mercancía desde hace aproximadamente 12 años, cuando inició la labor en busca de generar mayores ingresos para su hogar con los cuales pueda ofrecer a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida. Daneira es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 1 hijo a quien su padre abandonó hace un tiempo sin ofrecer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento, lo que ha hecho que Daneira tenga una gran responsabilidad en su hogar para poder sacar su hijo adelante. Daneira ofrece principalmente productos de uso personal a sus clientes y lo complementa con algunos artículos de cocina y decoración. Gracias a la buena calidad de los productos que ofrece Daneira, su negocio ha sido muy bien conocido por parte de los habitantes de su sector. La principal dificultad que presenta Daneira es que no tiene un lugar fijo donde pueda ofrecer su mercancía, lo que hace que tenga que ofrecer sus productos en la calle y la gente no la pueda ubicar tan fácilmente. Con el ánimo de comprar una estantería y surtir mejor su negocio, Daneira busca un préstamo que le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una estantería y comprar productos de uso personal para surtir su negocio.
Daneira espera que de esta manera sus ingresos mensuales aumenten considerablemente, puesto que sus clientes la podrán ubicar más fácilmente. Además, Daneira espera que la estantería que será ubicada en su hogar, sea el comienzo para adecuar un local en su vivienda donde pueda ofrecer una mejor atención a sus clientes. Daneira sueña con tener su negocio ubicado en un local propio y desde donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y con el cual le pueda ofrecer a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Daneira has worked in the sale of goods since about 12 years ago, when she began her work in search of generating greater income for her home with which she could provide her son a better quality of life. Daneira is a single mother, head of the family with 1 child, whose father abandoned him some time ago without offering any economic contribution for his upbringing. This has made Daneira have a great responsibility in her home in over to get her child ahead. Daneira offers mainly personal care products to her clients and she complements them with some kitchen and decorating items. The main difficulty that Daneira faces is that she does not have a fixed location where she can offer her merchandise, so she has to offer her products in the street and people can't locate her as easily. With the aim to buy a stand and better stock her business, Daneira is looking for a loan that will offer her the opportunity to buy a stand and buy personal care products to supply her business. 

Daneira hopes that in this way her monthly income will increase considerably, given that her clients will be able to locate her more easily. Additionally, Daneira hopes that the stand, which will be located in her home, will be the beginning in order to provide a location in her home where she can offer better service to her clients. Daneira dreams of having her business located in its own location, from which she can generate employment for people who need it most, and from which she can offer her son a better quality of life and better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a stand and buy personal care products to stock her business.

loans.name: Gilberto De Jesus

texts.es:
Gilberto es una persona que a pesar de las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida, ha tenido la fortaleza para superarlas y continuar progresando junto a su familia. Gilberto anteriormente tenía un taller de mecánica con el cual generaba empleo y desde el cual le podía ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, sin embargo, por conflictos de violencia en su municipio, se vio en la obligación de desplazarse hacia otro municipio dejando todo su trabajo de lado. Con el paso del tiempo su municipio ha mejorado la situación de violencia y ha podido retornar de nuevo hacia su propia vivienda. Allí, ha vuelto a montar su taller de mecánica de motos donde también tiene un almacén de venta de repuestos, y gracias a esto, ha vuelto a recuperar su negocio, su vivienda y la calidad de vida para su familia. Gracias a la buena calidad de los productos y las reparaciones que realiza en su taller, Gilberto es una persona muy reconocida y esto le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas. Con el ánimo de buscar mayor productividad en su taller, Gilberto busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de herramientas de trabajo para hacer su taller más productivo y poder cumplir con todos los pedidos de sus clientes. 
Gilberto espera que de esta manera pueda ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor atención, y de este modo sus ventas aumenten considerablemente. Además, espera poder volver a generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y con lo cual pueda impactar la calidad de vida de muchas más personas. Gilberto tiene el gran sueño de tener un taller que sea autorizado por una marca de motocicletas reconocida y de esta manera pueda tener una mayor acreditación.
texts.en:
Gilberto is a person who, in spite of the adversities that life has presented to him, has had the fortitude to overcome them and continue to progress, together with his family. In the past, Gilberto had a mechanic's workshop with which he generated employment and through which he was able to offer his family a better quality of life. Nevertheless, because of violent conflicts in his community, he saw the need to move to another community, leaving all his work behind. With the passing of time, his community has improved the situation with regard to violence, and he was able to return again to his own home. There he has again set up his motorcycle workshop, where he also has a store where he sells parts, and thanks to this, he has re-established his business, his home, and the quality of life of his family. Thanks to the good quality of the products he sells and the repairs that he does in his shop, Gilberto is a well-known person, and this has permitted him to have very good sales. With the spirit to seek better productivity in his shop, Gilberto is looking for a loan that will make it possible for him to buy work tools that will make his shop more productive and allow him to fill all the orders of his customers.

Gilberto hopes that in this way he can offer his customers better service and thus his sales will increase considerably. In addition, he hopes to be able to again generate jobs for the people most in need and thus impact the quality of life of many more people. Gilberto has the great dream of having a shop that is authorized by a well-known brand of motorcycles, and in this way he can have better accreditation.

loans.use: to buy work tools to make his workshop more productive and allow him to fill the orders of his customers

loans.name: Henry De Jesus

texts.es:
Henry es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre querer ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Henry se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijas de 1 y 4 años de edad, quienes son su motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio. Gran parte de su vida la ha dedicado a la actividad de la agricultura, pues su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y se la enseñó desde muy temprana edad. Gracias a esto, genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar y puede ofrecerle así una buena calidad de vida a su familia. Con la buena calidad que tienen sus cultivos, Henry ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes, lo que le ha garantizado un muy buen nivel de ventas. Con el ánimo de sacar su cultivo adelante, Henry busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de riegos y abono para su cultivo. 

Henry espera que de esta manera pueda sacar su cultivo de buena calidad y lo pueda ofrecer a un buen precio a sus clientes, además, que con mayores ingresos podrá ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Henry sueña con tener un gran negocio el cual sea reconocido y desde el cual pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas, además, sueña con ofrecerles una educación de calidad a sus 2 hijas.
texts.en:
Henry is a person who has characterized himself by being very hard-working and always wanting to offer his family a better quality of life.  Henry is married and has two daughters, who are one and four.  They are his motivation to work hard in his business.  He has dedicated a large part of his life to agriculture.  His father made a living this way and taught him it at a very early age.  Thanks to this, he makes the income necessary to support his home, and he can offer a good quality of life to his family.  With the good quality of his crops, Henry has managed to attract a number of customers, and he has guaranteed a good level of sales.  With the motivation of taking good care of his crops, Henry is looking for a loan that will offer him the possibility of buying irrigation and fertilizer for his crops.

Henry hopes that in this way, he can have a good quality crop and offer a good price to his customers.  He will also be able to offer a good quality of life to his family with better income.  Henry dreams about having a big business that is well-known where he can generate jobs for people who need them most.  He also dreams about offering a quality education to his two daughters.

loans.use: to buy irrigation and fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy the fabric that she needs to make her clients' orders.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a horse so he can take up his business of transporting materials again.

loans.name: Javier Honorio

texts.es:
Javier es una persona rebuscadora que entre varias actividades ha conseguido generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su familia. Javier es padre de 4 hijos quienes están a su cargo debido a que su madre los abandonó hace un tiempo, lo que hace que toda la responsabilidad caiga sobre Javier y les deba garantizar la mejor calidad de vida posible. Gracias a la amabilidad que lo caracteriza, y al buen servicio que ofrece, Javier es reconocido en su municipio y esto le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas. Javier se dedica a la compra y venta de madera, y al transporte de mercancía o acarreos cuando sus clientes se lo piden. Gracias a que cuenta con un carro el cual tiene un gran espacio para el transporte de estas mercancías, Javier tiene una ventaja sobre su competencia lo que hace que a menudo sea preferido entre las demás personas. Con el ánimo de implementar el sistema de gas para su vehículo, Javier busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a equipar su vehículo con el sistema de gas para ahorrar en el gasto que tiene de combustible. 
Javier espera que de esta manera sus ingresos no se consuman tan rápidamente, pues ya no tendrá que gastar grandes sumas de dinero en combustible para su vehículo. Javier sueña con tener un buen negocio y con ofrecer a sus hijos una buena educación que lo prepare para un empleo que sea bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Javier is an instinctive person who has been able to generate the necessary income to support his family through various activities.  He is the father of four children for whom he cares since their mother abandoned them awhile ago.  This means that all of the responsibility of guaranteeing them the best quality of life possible falls to Javier.  Thanks to his friendliness and the good service that he offers, Javier is known in his town, and this lets him have very good sales.  Javier buys and sells wood and transports merchandise for customers that ask him to.  Thanks to having his own cart, he has a large space to transport this merchandise, which gives him an advantage over his competition, which often makes him preferred by many people.  Javier is looking for a loan that will let him implement his vehicle with a gas system that will save him fuel costs.

He hopes that in this way, his income will not be consumed so quickly.  He will not have to spend large amounts of money on gas for his vehicle anymore.  He dreams about having a good business and offering his children a good education that prepares them for good-paying jobs.

loans.use: to equip his vehicle with a gas system that will save him on fuel costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products such as cold cuts and groceries to increase the variety of products she sells to her customers.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.fr: Madame Aminata  vit au Sénégal. Elle est âgée  de 54 ans. Elle est divorcée et mère  3 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre 16 et 33 ans. Elle évolue dans le commerce  d’effets de  femmes.  C’est une activité  qu’elle a démarré juste après sa retraite, sous l’influence   de son frère commerçant.  L’étape  la plus importante pour elle  dans son activité est l’étape ou elle fait le choix de ses produits. Elle est membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC et sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat  d’effets de femmes a revendre. Son intention est d’augmenter son fond de roulement et d’accroitre ses profits et  relever le niveau de vie familial.
texts.en:
Madame Aminata lives in Senegal. She is 54 years old. She is a divorced woman and mother of three children between the ages of 16 and 33. 

She is in the business of selling women's products. She stared this business just after she retired, under the influence of her merchant brother. The most important step for her in her business is choosing her products. She is a member of her local branch of U-IMCEC and is seeking a loan of 300,000 francs, which she plans to use to purchase women's products for resale. 

She aims to increase her working capital as well as her profits, and raise her family's standard of living.

loans.use: acheter des effets de femmes a revendre

loans.name: Maria Elicenia

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y esto le ha permitido superar las adversidades que le ha presentado la vida. Maria es una madre soltera de 1 hijo quien siempre ha sido su motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio, y a quien su padre abandonó desde hace un largo tiempo. Con el ánimo de generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar, Maria decidió montar su propio negocio el cual es una venta de prendas de vestir para dama, y con el cual ha podido generar los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Su negocio siempre se ha caracterizado por ofrecer prendas de muy buena calidad y por ofrecer un muy buen servicio. Con el ánimo de ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos en su negocio, Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir para dama y así ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.

Maria espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, además de que su hijo podrá gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Maria sueña con tener un gran negocio y ubicarse en un lugar más amplio y donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Maria is a person who has always been characterized as very hardworking, and this has allowed her to overcome the adversities that have come her way in life. Maria is a single mother of one son whose father left them a long time ago. Her son has always been her motivation for working hard at her business. With the intention of generating enough income to sustain her household, Maria decided to start her own business which is selling women's clothing. This has allowed her to make enough money to maintain her home. Her business has always been known for offering good quality garments and very good service. 

With the desire to offer a greater variety of products, Maria is looking for a loan that will give her the opportunity to buy women's clothing.  Maria hopes that this will help her income increase considerably so that her son can have a better quality of life. Maria dreams of having a large business and a bigger store where she can create jobs for people in greater need.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing so that she can offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

loans.name: Sophy's Group

texts.en: Sophy is a 42-year-old mother of two dependent sons who are still in school. For the survival of the rest of the family, she and her husband have been farming for 20 years as the primary source of income. Additionally, her husband also works as a construction worker to earn more income. Sophy joined VisionFund in 2010 for her first loan cycle and successfully repaid back her entire loan. The loan has improved her lifestyle standard which is better than before and she has also managed to build some savings for future needs. She can now earn about US$4 per day. With the satisfactory result of the previous loan, she is confidently in requesting a new loan with another member in the amount of 1,200,000 each. As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her dry season rice farming. She hopes to generate more income so as to build a new house, keep both of her sons in school, and have some saving for future.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seeds for her dry season rice farming

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Safia Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Safia bibi is a 46-year-old married woman and by this relationship, she has three children who are now grown. Safia runs a business of selling blankets & clothes. She purchases these items from different cities and sells to her community areas and to different shops of the markets. 
She does this work to supplement the income of her family. Her husband is an employee in a private firm and on a monthly wage.  
Safia has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her own business. She will utilize the loan in buying of clothes and blankets in larger quantity for reselling. 
She is hopeful that her business will earn her better profits after investing the loan into it. 

Note: In the picture, one of the members is showing her toys selling business.

loans.use: To buy clothes & blankets for reselling

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por tener un gran carisma, el cual le ha permitido ofrecerles a las demás personas una mejor calidad de vida y el cual le ha permitido ganarse el afecto de una gran cantidad de personas. Maria tenía el sueño de poder brindarles a las personas de otros municipios que querían estudiar en su municipio, la oportunidad de encontrar un lugar donde se pudiesen hospedar con tarifas mucho más bajas a las que se encuentran en los hoteles comunes. De esta manera Maria abrió su hogar comenzó a alquilar algunas habitaciones de su vivienda para personas con muy bajos recursos de otros municipios que buscaban en su municipio una mejor educación. Gracias a esta actividad, Maria genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye en su hogar a la generación de ingresos y de esta manera les ofrece a sus 3 hijos y su esposo una mejor calidad de vida, al mismo tiempo que le mejora la calidad de vida y le ofrece mayores oportunidades a las demás personas. Además de esta actividad, Maria también ofrece productos de uso personal a través de catálogo, lo que le permite tener ingresos extras con los que puede ofrecer más a su familia. Con el ánimo de hacer sus labores de manera más productiva, Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de electrodomésticos con los cuales pueda hacer su trabajo más productivo.

Maria espera que de esta manera pueda tener mayor productividad y poder atender a un mayor número de personas, de modo que sus ingresos aumente y también impacte la calidad de vida de más personas. Maria sueña con en un futuro no muy lejano montar su propio restaurante y poder generar empleo par las personas más necesitadas y desde el cual le pueda ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is a person who has always been known to be very charismatic, which has helped her win the affections of a great number of people and improve their quality of life. Maria had a dream of being able to help people from other towns who wanted to study in her city, and got the opportunity by finding a place where she could house people at much lower rates than community hotels. In this way Maria opened up her home by renting out some rooms to out-of-towners with few resources who came to her city for a better education. Thanks to this activity, Maria has generated income to contribute to the household finances and offer her three children and her husband a better quality of life while at the same time improving the quality of life and providing better opportunities to others as well. In addition to this activity, Maria also sells personal-use products via catalog, which earns her extra income for her family. With the goal of doing her work more productively, Maria is requesting a loan so she can purchase household appliances that will make her job easier. Maria hopes that in this way she can increase her productivity and tend to a greater number of people, so she can grow her profits and also make an impact in more people's lives. Maria dreams in the not-too-distant future she can start up her own restaurant and provide employment to people in need while also improving her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase appliances to increase her productivity.

loans.name: Chheng Leang

texts.en:
Chheng Leang (in the photo), age 29, is a tailor. Her husband, Sophoun, age 34, is a motor taxi driver. He hopes to change his business from a motor taxi driver to a Tuk Tuk* driver, because it can carry more goods and people than a motor taxi. Hence, Chheng Leang decided to ask for a loan of $1,000 to buy a Tuk Tuk for her husband. 

Chheng Leang and her husband live in the suburb of Phnom Penh City and they just have one young son. 

*three-wheeled motorcycle taxi

loans.use: To buy a Tuk Tuk for her husband to drive as a Tuk Tuk taxi driver.

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
Nelia is 29 years of age and still single. She dreams to have a successful business and have her own family some day. She engages herself in selling motorcycle parts and accessories to generates income. She has been operating this business for almost six years, earning a profits of P10,000 a month that she uses to spend on their food, clothing, and allowances of her younger brother and sister. 

She planned to improve the business and save more income for her future. But due to financial constraints, she is asking for additional capital of P15,000 to buy additional stock of motorcycle parts and accessories to sell. She hopes that through hard work, she will make an improvement in the business and will become financially stable.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of motorcycle parts and accessories to sell

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza  is a 41-year-old piggery business owner who wants to feel progress in financial matters someday. She is married and has two school-aged children. Her children's schooling expenses are quite high, so Flordeliza is aiming for a higher profit.

In connection with this, Flordeliza is asking for a loan of 12,000 pesos to buy two additional pigs, feeds, and vitamins. She hopes that through her loan, she would provide enough allowances of her children as well as save for their everyday expenses.

loans.use: to buy two additional pigs, feeds, and vitamins

loans.name: Sophal

texts.en:
Sophal (in the photo with his loom), age 48, is a widower. He lives with his sister in a village on an Island of Mekong River, about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Sophal is a silk weaver. In addition, he also buys some silk fabrics from his fellow weavers and transports them to sell in other provinces. He is applying for a loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase silk materials for his silk weaving business. He will use a part of the loan to buy more silk products for resale.

loans.use: To purchase silk materials for his silk weaving business and to buy more silk products for resale.

loans.name: Nellieflor May

texts.en:
Nellieflor May is married and has three school-age children. With her husband, she plans to improve their living conditions and educate their children. To generate income, she is engaged in selling grocery items and cooking dishes to sell. She has been in this business for more than eight (8) years now. Her income is a great help to her family, especially for the education of her children. 

Despite hardships and competitors in the area, she can still manage the business well. She is requesting for an additional capital of PHP8,000 to buy pork, fish, vegetables, ingredients and seasonings to be cooked and sold in the food stall. She believes that she will be able to make an improvement in the business through her patience and hard work.

loans.use: to buy pork, fish, vegetables, ingredients and seasonings to be cooked and sold in the food stall.

loans.name: Phea

texts.en:
Phea (in the photo), age 41, is garment worker. Her husband, Vantha, age 40, is a rice farmer. They have been married since 1992 and they have three children. Of their two sons and one daughter, one is a teacher and the other two are attending school. They family is living in a village about ten kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Phea is requesting her first loan of $1,000 to buy a motorcycle to get work.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike to get work.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn, aged 50, makes a living by raising hogs. She has been doing this for over eight years. The income generated from selling of her hogs helped her to improve their living situation, especially towards the studies of her three children. She wants to continue to operate and develop her business. 

For this reason, Jocelyn is asking a loan of 8,000 to buy feed, hogs and medicines. In the future, Jocelyn hopes for to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, hogs and medicines.

loans.name: Nabeela Jamal's Group

texts.en:
Nabeela jamal is married woman, involved in a sewing & embroidery business. Her work is home based. She sews dresses with perfect measurement and crafts beautiful hand embroidery on dresses. Her customers are very much satisfied with her work. She does this work to supplement the income for her family. She has been doing this work for over 6 years. 

Nabeela has requested for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the expansion of her business. With the loan, she will buy an embroidery machine and be able to complete more orders from her clients and to earn more income. She is sure that an embroidery machine will enable her to complete the orders on time and leave a good impact on her customers to order regularly.

loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine.

loans.name: Channang

texts.en:
Channang (in the photo with her loom), age 44, is single. She lives with her parents and sister and brother on an Island in the Mekong River, about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Channang is weaver. She is applying for a loan in the amount of $500 to purchase weaving materials for her weaving business.

loans.use: to purchase weaving materials for her weaving business.

loans.name: Sokhoeun

texts.en:
Sokhoeun (pictured here), age 48, is a widow with eight children: three sons and five daughters. The family lives in a village about twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh, the capital of Cambodia. 

Sokhoeun sells fish and fruits. She buys mangoes from her fellow villagers under contract. This means that she pays money before the harvesting season and then she collects mangoes to sell at Phnom Penh market. 

Sokhoeun is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,500 in order to expand her business buy by purchasing mangoes under contract for resale.

loans.use: to purchase mangoes under contract for resale.

loans.name: Estefania

texts.en:
Estefania is 52 years of age and she continuously operates her hog fattening business as a source of income. Her business is a great help in supporting her three children. Her children also help her in developing her business. 

Estefania then would like to acquire loan as additional working capital an amount of 10,000 pesos. It will be used in purchase of pigs and vitamins. She hopes that this time, she could be able to enlarge her profit for the welfare of family.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and vitamins.

loans.name: Mony

texts.en:
Mony (in the photo),48 years old, and his wife, Reaksmey, age 47, live in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have four children: one son and three daughters. Two of the children are garment workers, one is a security guard and another attends school.  

Mony is a motorbike and bicycle repairman and he also grows rice when rice farming season comes. His wife raises pigs and produces rice wine. He is asking for his first loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain his rice farm and to assist in his wife’s pig farming business by buying additional pigs to raise.

loans.use: To purchase seeds, fertilizer and pesticides to maintain his rice farm and to assist in his wife’s pig farming business by buying additional pigs to raise.

loans.name: Sok Khea

texts.en:
Sok Khea (in the photo) is 32 years old and her husband, Thy, is 50 years old. They live in a village about twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1995 and they have four children who are in school.  

Sok Khea sells grocery items in front of a garment factory, while her husband has full-time employment. She is asking for her first loan in the amount of $1,300 to buy additional grocery items for resale.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery items for resale.

loans.name: Mila

texts.en:
